title: Chinese style dragon made out of a plastic drinking straw
body: From where I come from, it's usually coconut trees are made from Mountain Dew/Sprite plastic bottles. Looks like it's assembled out of many bendy-straws, not just one. Yeah, that's pretty neat! After being summoned again and again to revive krillin, shenron decided it was the last straw and became a shrimp.
readable_content:
- Mom_with_spaghetti (2016-12-08): Mana wyrm intensifies
- -PM-ME-YOUR-BOOBIES (2016-12-08): Looks like a shrimp
- self3dot0 (2016-12-08): The front end reminds me of the 'bug' that burrowed into Neo in The Matrix.
- Suicidalparrot (2016-12-08): From the thumbnail I thought the person was sitting hundreds of feet in the air on a tower or something overlooking multicolored plots of farmland.
- inlighten1 (2016-12-08): Stunning.
- moonshiver (2016-12-08): This is better than most the subs on r/art
- ihatepseudonymns (2016-12-08): Is there a creation gif?
- [deleted] (2016-12-08): Is shrimp
